thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 13 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: National Australia Bank Responds To APRA Paper On Capital Framework

author: Reuters Editorial
title: National Australia Bank Responds To APRA Paper On Capital Framework

organizations.name: national australia bank responds to apra

text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - National Australia Bank Ltd:
* NAB RESPONDS TO APRA PAPER ON CAPITAL FRAMEWORK-NAB.AX
* NAB CONTINUES TO EXPECT TO MEET APRA‘S 10.5 PCT TARGET IN AN ORDERLY MANNER BY JANUARY 2020
* ‍CONSULTATION ON DRAFT PRUDENTIAL STANDARDS FOR CREDIT AND OPERATIONAL RISK IS EXPECTED TO FOLLOW IN LATE 2018​
* AS AT DEC. 31 2017, NAB‘S LEVERAGE RATIO WAS 5.4 PERCENT
* APRA PROPOSED MINIMUM LEVERAGE RATIO REQUIREMENT OF 4% FOR INTERNAL RATINGS BASED ADIS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
